overview: “Aaron is the Vice President of Business Development at Mozes. Prior to joining Mozes, he spent six years in management roles at Citadon, an on-demand provider of web-based collaboration solutions backed by Warburg Pincus and Insight Venture Partners. At Citadon, Aaron oversaw customer service and managed infrastructure operations, overseeing two global datacenters that supported customers such as Ikea, General Motors and GE. Prior to Citadon Aaron was a Field Engineer for Minneapolis-based Vital Images, the leading provider of 3D medical visualization and analysis software. Aaron holds an M.S with honors in GIS and a B.S with honors in Geography, Mathematics and Chemistry, all from Minnesota State University, where he also played intercollegiate football and baseball.” (Source: Mozes)
